lines.name: Demigod's Eye
lines.flavourText: The victor stands tall with hand held high,|unwavering, unblinking, unstoppable.

lines.name: Headhunter

explicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Damage with Hits against Rare monsters
When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain its mods for 20 seconds

lines.flavourText: "A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and|judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.|The head is where the Man is."|- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: Eyes of the Greatwolf

implicitModifiers.text: (10-12)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
16% increased Area of Effect of Area Skills
100% of Fire Damage taken as Lightning Damage
Gain (22-24)% of Physical Damage as Extra Damage of a random Element
100% of Cold Damage taken as Lightning Damage
20% chance to gain an Endurance Charge on Kill

lines.flavourText: I am but a vessel for a greater force.|It acts through me. Speaks through me.|Decides what lives and dies through me.|And will change the world through me.

lines.name: Night's Hold

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by level 10 Added Chaos Damage
Socketed Gems are supported by level 10 Blind
Socketed Gems are supported by level 10 Cast when Stunned

lines.flavourText: In the light of Solaris, the shadows cower and hide.|But every night they gather and grow,|and all but the strong and the stupid|seek shelter from their grasp until daybreak.

lines.name: The Retch

explicitModifiers.text: 0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
30% reduced Flask Charges gained while using a Flask
200% of Life Leech applies to Enemies as Chaos Damage
15% increased Movement Speed while using a Flask

lines.flavourText: But the grain grew twisted and the water turned dark|and those who partook of Mother Gull's gift|birthed monsters that fed |on the flesh of one another.

lines.name: The Taming

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments per Freeze, Shock and Ignite on Enemy
10% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
30% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText: "Moon after moon did Berek make fools|Of the great and Untamed Three|Until malice for a Brother|Slew the hatred of the Other|And Berek did hunt|Alone and free."|- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Faminebind

explicitModifiers.text: Deals 50 Chaos Damage per second to nearby Enemies

lines.flavourText: After the Great Fire, the land lay barren|and our forefathers grew weak.|Mother Gull took pity on them|and gave them grain and water.

lines.name: Berek's Respite

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (20-25) to (30-50) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
When you Kill a Shocked Enemy, inflict an equivalent Shock on each nearby Enemy
When you Kill an Ignited Enemy, inflict an equivalent Ignite on each nearby Enemy

lines.flavourText: "With Flame licking at his heels|Berek berated the clouds|Until vengeful Storm spewed forth his rains|And Berek held on tight|As Fire screamed and steamed|And fled."|- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Feastbind

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 5 to 10 Physical Damage to Attacks
0.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% increased Flask Charges gained while using a Flask
50% increased Mana Regeneration Rate while using a Flask

lines.flavourText: Our forefathers danced and drank and ate their fill|and did not honour the First Ones for their gifts.|So the First Ones filled the sky with fire.

lines.name: Daresso's Salute

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life
+2 to Melee Weapon and Unarmed range
60% increased Melee Damage when on Full Life

lines.flavourText: "A bit short in the arm, are you? |Then you'll be short of a head soon enough."|- Daresso the Daring

lines.name: Xoph's Blood

explicitModifiers.text: Cover Enemies in Ash when they Hit you

lines.flavourText: We are his blood.|Through us he carries his burning message.

lines.name: Xoph's Heart

explicitModifiers.text: Cover Enemies in Ash when they Hit you

lines.flavourText: His is our heart.|To its beat we all are driven.||<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Xoph}

lines.name: Presence of Chayula

explicitModifiers.text: 20% of Maximum Life Converted to Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: The dreamer stirs, the world trembles.

lines.name: Shavronne's Revelation

explicitModifiers.text: Right ring slot: You cannot Regenerate Mana
Right ring slot: 3% of Energy Shield Regenerated per second
Right ring slot: +100 to maximum Mana
Left ring slot: You cannot Recharge or Regenerate Energy Shield
Left ring slot: 40 Mana Regenerated per Second
Left ring slot: +100 to maximum Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: "Shavronne held Sanity in her right|hand and Revelation in her left.|Brutus chose the left hand."|- Kadavrus, Surgeon to the Umbra

lines.name: Voll's Devotion

explicitModifiers.text: Gain an Endurance Charge when a Power Charge expires or is consumed

lines.flavourText: "We are the soldiers of Faith, armoured in devotion.|Let the sinners come, for we - the Pure - shall endure!"|- Voll of Thebrus, at the Battle of the Bridge

lines.name: Valako's Sign

explicitModifiers.text: 40% increased Damage with Hits against Shocked Enemies
0.2% of Damage Leeched as Life against Shocked Enemies

lines.flavourText: A gift from Valako,|appointing Kiloava as the Herald of War.|A title Kaom claimed when he ended Kiloava's bloodline.

lines.name: Hinekora's Sight
lines.flavourText: Remember the past, anticipate the future.

lines.name: Berek's Grip

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (50-70) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
1% of Damage Leeched as Life against Shocked Enemies
1% of Damage Leeched as Mana against Frozen Enemies

lines.flavourText: "Berek hid from Storm's lightning wrath|In the embrace of oblivious Frost|Repelled by ice, blinded by blizzards|Storm raged in vain|While Berek slept."|- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: The Pandemonius

explicitModifiers.text: Chill Enemy for 1 second when Hit
Damage Penetrates 20% Cold Resistance against Chilled Enemies

lines.flavourText: A single moment sets in motion an eternal fall,|beneath which all are buried.

lines.name: Bisco's Collar

explicitModifiers.text: (100-150)% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Slain Magic Enemies
(50-100)% increased Quantity of Items Dropped by Slain Normal Enemies

lines.flavourText: Friendship worth its weight in gold,|a treasure every day.|I thought together we'd grow old,|until fate pulled you away.

lines.name: Rigwald's Crest

explicitModifiers.text: 5% Chance to Trigger Level 18 Summon Spectral Wolf on Kill

lines.flavourText: Within the heart of every man and woman|lies the soul of a ferocious beast.|If you cannot tame it, embrace it.

lines.name: Star of Wraeclast

explicitModifiers.text: 60% increased Area of Effect of Curse Skills
You cannot be Cursed with Silence

lines.flavourText: "I offer to you an eternal oath |that binds your heart to mine;|a bond that not even death will break.|Will you accept?"|- Daresso, to his beloved

lines.name: Gifts from Above

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger level 10 Consecrate when you deal a Critical Strike
(40-50)% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Enemies killed with a Critical Strike
50% increased Damage while on Consecrated Ground
5% additional Block Chance while on Consecrated Ground

lines.flavourText: God blesses those who bless themselves.

lines.name: Victario's Acuity

explicitModifiers.text: 10% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
10% chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill
5% increased Projectile Speed per Frenzy Charge
5% increased Projectile Damage per Power Charge

lines.flavourText: "Grind your words into sharp thoughts.|Grind your thoughts into the sharpest of deeds."|- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: The Halcyon

explicitModifiers.text: 60% increased Damage if you've Frozen an Enemy Recently

lines.flavourText: We wait, still as the dead,|to join the great avalanche.||<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Tul}

lines.name: The Pariah

explicitModifiers.text: +100 to Maximum Life per Red Socket
+100 to Maximum Mana per Green Socket
+100 to Maximum Energy Shield per Blue Socket
15% increased Item Quantity per White Socket

lines.flavourText: A man who changes his loyalties often,|soon finds he has none.

lines.name: Rigwald's Curse

explicitModifiers.text: Modifiers to Claw Damage also apply to Unarmed
Modifiers to Claw Attack Speed also apply to Unarmed
Modifiers to Claw Critical Strike Chance also apply to Unarmed

lines.flavourText: I once thought the First Ones were just|stories made to scare children.|But I've seen what they can do. I've felt it.|And now I must live with that terrible knowledge.

lines.name: Astramentis
lines.flavourText: Mindless rage will shake the world,|Cunning lies will bend it.|Reckless haste will break the world,|And into darkness send it.

lines.name: Tasalio's Sign

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (7-10) to (15-20) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds 40 to 60 Cold Damage against Chilled Enemies

lines.flavourText: A gift from Tasalio, God of Water,|to the chieftain Rakiata.|Kaom took Rakiata's head and hand|so that his warriors' axes might rise and fall like the waves.

lines.name: Choir of the Storm

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Lightning Bolt when you deal a Critical Strike
Critical Strike Chance is increased by Lightning Resistance

lines.flavourText: But the fool did not bow.|The fool stood and questioned.|And the fool was unwritten.

lines.name: Ventor's Gamble
lines.flavourText: In a blaze of glory,|An anomaly defying all odds|The "unkillable" beast met the divine|And Ventor met his latest trophy.

lines.name: Voice of the Storm

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 12 Lightning Bolt when you deal a Critical Strike
Critical Strike Chance is increased by Lightning Resistance

lines.flavourText: When she of many mouths spoke,|we bowed in awe and were crushed.||<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Esh}

lines.name: Death Rush

explicitModifiers.text: (0.6-0.8)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You gain Onslaught for (2-4) seconds on Kill

lines.flavourText: To truly appreciate life you must be there when it ends

lines.name: Voidheart

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 3 Chaos Damage to Attacks
10% chance to Cause Monsters to Flee
Melee Attacks have (30-50)% chance to cause Bleeding
Melee Attacks have (20-40)% chance to Poison on Hit

lines.flavourText: Nothing spreads fear faster than the unknown.

lines.name: Ngamahu Tiki

explicitModifiers.text: You gain 100 Evasion Rating when on Low Life
1% of Life Regenerated per second while on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Flames to guide the Great Spirit to the site of the dead,|and smoke to carry them into the sky.

lines.name: Perandus Signet

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Intelligence for each Unique Item you have equipped
3% additional chance for Slain monsters to drop Scrolls of Wisdom

lines.flavourText: "Our warehouses are bursting. Our vaults are full.|But our minds are still hungry."|- Medici Perandus, Prefect to the Treasury

lines.name: Voideye
lines.flavourText: The darker the eye, the more diligent the watched.

lines.name: Carnage Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (1.2-2)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

lines.flavourText: Forged from the blood of countless wars, |its thirst has only begun.

lines.name: Blood of Corruption
lines.flavourText: In my dream, a voice spoke to me. It said:|'My reach knows no bounds.|All that is pure is destined to rot.|All that lives is destined to serve.'|- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Kaom's Way

explicitModifiers.text: 0.4% of maximum Life Regenerated per second per Endurance Charge
+(2-4) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks

lines.flavourText: Kaom guided his Karui across the sea|and spilled their blood on foreign soil.

lines.name: Berek's Pass

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-25) to (23-50) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText: "From Frost's ice-bound pass|Berek taunted and jeered|Until furious Flame scaled the mountain|Berek escaped through the thaw|And Frost's tortured moans."|- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Karui Charge
lines.flavourText: For dead men require no answer.

lines.name: Le Heup of All

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText: Existence is infinite|A weave of the living and dead|Beyond the understanding|Of the many mortal threads

lines.name: Auxium

explicitModifiers.text: Chill and Freeze effect on you is based on 65% of Energy Shield
(10-20)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
0.2% of Attack Damage Leeched as Mana per Power Charge

lines.flavourText: As long as the soul is unfettered, so is the body.

lines.name: Essence Worm

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems

lines.flavourText: "This thing is not a pet. It is a parasite that feeds on the very will of its host.|Like any part of nightmare, it has found a way to make its price... acceptable."|- Malachai the Soulless

lines.name: Thief's Torment

explicitModifiers.text: 50% reduced Effect of Curses on You
+(40-60) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
+30 Mana gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks

lines.flavourText: The ring I stole,|My finger they took,|A shrouded mind,|Cut their curses short,|As I drained their spirit|And stole their soul.|A blessing is often a curse.

lines.name: The Flow Untethered

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Summon Harbinger of Time Skill

lines.flavourText: <<HBGAa>><<HBG02>><<HBGAb>><<HBG03>><<HBG02>><<HBGAc>><<HBG03>><<HBGAd>>|<<HBGAa>><<HBG02>><<HBGAb>><<HBG03>><<HBG02>><<HBGAc>><<HBG03>><<HBGAe>>|<<HBGAa>><<HBG01>><<HBGAf>><<HBG02>><<HBGAg>><<HBG03>><<HBGAa>><<HBG01>><<HBGAb>>

lines.name: Andvarius
lines.flavourText: Danger is the price of wealth.

lines.name: Call of the Brotherhood

explicitModifiers.text: 40% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Your spells have 100% chance to Shock against Frozen Enemies

lines.flavourText: Forged by three brothers|so that they may recognize each other|across any distance of time or travel.

lines.name: Umbilicus Immortalis

explicitModifiers.text: Flasks do not apply to You
Flasks apply to your Zombies and Spectres

lines.flavourText: "The power of rebirth rivals that of immortality."|- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 3

lines.name: Winterheart

explicitModifiers.text: 20% of Life Regenerated per second while Frozen

lines.flavourText: Those who dwell in the deep freeze|enjoy a special kind of madness.

lines.name: Bisco's Leash

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Rarity of Items found per 15 Rampage Kills

lines.flavourText: You were always there, by my side,|whether we sat or played.|Our friendship was a joyful ride,|I wish you could have stayed.

lines.name: Eye of Innocence

explicitModifiers.text: Take 100 Fire Damage when you Ignite an Enemy
2% of Fire Damage Leeched as Life while Ignited

lines.flavourText: "...and so He said: 'Let only the good meet my gaze'|and no eye met His. So He called down the cleansing flames|and let black smoke sweep the Sinners away."|- Book of Innocence

lines.name: Ascent From Flesh

explicitModifiers.text: You have Phasing if Energy Shield Recharge has started Recently
6% chance to Dodge Attacks while Phasing

lines.flavourText: A single step forward|Snap free from the prison|Reborn into freedom eternal

lines.name: Atziri's Foible

explicitModifiers.text: Items and Gems have 25% reduced Attribute Requirements

lines.flavourText: The world is but a piece of parchment, blank and symmetric. |We label each side: one Good, one Evil; one Black, one White. |The divine truth, however, is that both are one and the same. |-Jaetai, Vaal Advisor

lines.name: Belt of the Deceiver

explicitModifiers.text: You take 30% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes

lines.flavourText: In battle, virtue matters not. |Only victory.

lines.name: Brinerot Mark

explicitModifiers.text: 25% increased Effect of Buffs granted by Socketed Golem Skills
Socketed Golem Skills gain 20% of Maximum Life as Extra Maximum Energy Shield
+3 to Level of Socketed Golem Gems

lines.flavourText: Each time, it is granted to the most senior captain of the fleet,|and each time, the ring soon washes ashore once more, |still wrapped around a severed finger.

lines.name: Dream Fragments
lines.flavourText: Doryani stumbled into a realm of madness|And awoke its Master.

lines.name: Emberwake

explicitModifiers.text: You can inflict an additional Ignite on an Enemy

lines.flavourText: Leave the world in flames behind you.

lines.name: Eye of Chayula
lines.flavourText: Never blinking, always watching.

lines.name: Kikazaru

explicitModifiers.text: 40% reduced Effect of Curses on You
1 Life Regenerated per second per Level

lines.flavourText: Hear no evil.

lines.name: Meginord's Girdle

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-10) to (15-20) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText: Kaom's strength was rivaled only by|the great Meginord of the north.

lines.name: Mutewind Seal

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Golem Skills have 20% increased Attack and Cast Speed
Gain Onslaught for 10 seconds when you Cast Socketed Golem Skill
+3 to Level of Socketed Golem Gems
Adds (5-10) to (11-15) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText: When a fallen leader's body is taken to the funeral peak,|those who seek power must ascend together.|One returns with the seal. |The rest do not return at all.

lines.name: Ngamahu's Sign

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (8-10) to (12-14) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Recover (20-30) Life when you Ignite an Enemy

lines.flavourText: A gift from Ngamahu,|a sign to the Karui to spread like fire.|Given to Akoya, but inherited by Kaom with the swing of his axe.

lines.name: Praxis

explicitModifiers.text: 8% of Damage taken gained as Mana over 4 seconds when Hit

lines.flavourText: The Thaumaturgical masters of the Eternal Empire,|as unpredictable and varied as they were,|all understood one thing:|Free thinking leads to free action.

lines.name: Pyre

explicitModifiers.text: (40-100)% of Cold Damage Converted to Fire Damage
Ignited Enemies you hit are destroyed on Kill

lines.flavourText: Let winter come. It will only make my fire burn brighter.

lines.name: Redblade Band

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Golem Skills have 25% chance to Taunt on Hit
Socketed Golem Skills have 5% Life Regenerated per second
+3 to Level of Socketed Golem Gems

lines.flavourText: To ascend to leadership, the child of a Redblade warlord|must pull the band from the still-hot|ashes of their father.

lines.name: Snakepit
lines.flavourText: They wrap around you|until your blood turns as cold as theirs.

lines.name: Stone of Lazhwar

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Block Chance applied to Spells

lines.flavourText: You are slow, foolish and ignorant.|I am not.

lines.name: The Ascetic

explicitModifiers.text: (80-100)% increased Rarity of Items found with a Normal Item equipped
(10-15)% increased Quantity of Items found with a Magic Item equipped

lines.flavourText: Many things come to one who has nothing.

lines.name: The Warden's Brand

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-15) to (25-50) Physical Damage to Attacks
15% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge when you Stun an Enemy

lines.flavourText: "I don't always have a flame handy|when a fresh delinquent walks through our gates."|- Brutus, Warden of Axiom

lines.name: Doryani's Invitation

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Fire Damage Leeched as Life
10% chance to Ignite while using a Flask

lines.flavourText: "You can invite them but you can never be |sure who will come knocking."|- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Doryani's Invitation

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life
Your Flasks grant 10% chance to Shock while using a Flask
10% chance to Shock while using a Flask

lines.flavourText: "You can invite them but you can never be |sure who will come knocking."|- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Doryani's Invitation

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Physical Damage Leeched as Life
25% reduced Enemy Stun Threshold while using a Flask

lines.flavourText: "You can invite them but you can never be |sure who will come knocking."|- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Perseverance

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Attack Damage per 300 of the lowest of Armour and Evasion Rating
(14-20)% chance to gain Fortify on Melee Stun
You have Onslaught while you have Fortify

lines.flavourText: "Some blows must be evaded. Some blows must be endured.|The trick is to tell them apart."|- Daresso, the Sword King

lines.name: Ryslatha's Coil

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (15-20) Physical Damage to Attacks
Gain 50 Life when you Stun an Enemy

lines.flavourText: All creatures have the potential for greatness|or unequivocal failure.

lines.name: Ming's Heart

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText: Ming slew Tranquillity|Took Chaos for his wife|And on Her immortal finger|He placed his Heart

lines.name: Doryani's Invitation

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Cold Damage Leeched as Life
10% chance to Freeze while using a Flask
Your Flasks grant 10% chance to Freeze while using a Flask

lines.flavourText: "You can invite them but you can never be |sure who will come knocking."|- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Doedre's Damning
lines.flavourText: Where her mouth should have been|there was only a whirling, black void.

lines.name: Bloodgrip

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 10 to 20 Physical Damage to Attacks
Moving while Bleeding doesn't cause you to take extra Damage

lines.flavourText: Combat is simple.|Keep your blood in.|Take theirs out.

lines.name: Marylene's Fallacy
lines.flavourText: "Marylene stroked the medallion at her breast |before every duel and every cast of the die." |- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: Araku Tiki

explicitModifiers.text: You gain 100 Evasion Rating when on Low Life
1% of Life Regenerated per second while on Low Life

lines.flavourText: It is said to make you invisible when the Great|Spirit comes to take you on your final journey.

lines.name: Bated Breath
lines.flavourText: At knifepoint, a moment's hesitation means death.

lines.name: Blackheart

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 3 Chaos Damage to Attacks
10% chance to Cause Monsters to Flee

lines.flavourText: Fear is highly infectious.

lines.name: Dyadian Dawn

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life against Chilled Enemies
Enemies Ignited by an Attack Burn 35% faster

lines.flavourText: With her cold resolve|And burning sacrifice|The Eternal twins arose.

lines.name: Immortal Flesh

explicitModifiers.text: 40% increased Armour while not Ignited, Frozen or Shocked

lines.flavourText: "She begged the Earth to spare her Son;|Out of love the Earth agreed.|To the other Elements she did not speak|And out of spite They plotted."|- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Kaom's Sign

explicitModifiers.text: +(2-4) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

lines.flavourText: A token from the sea|A sign for Kaom|to lead his Karui to Wraeclast.

lines.name: Karui Ward
lines.flavourText: "Shoot first, ask no questions."|- Karui wisdom

lines.name: Lori's Lantern

explicitModifiers.text: (6-8)% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life
+(20-25)% Chaos Resistance when on Low Life
While on Low Life, Enemies are Unlucky when Damaging you

lines.flavourText: By its light, Lori led her young charges to safety |and bound up their wounds. |Her sword arm was iron, yet her heart gentle |and proof against hate.

lines.name: Malachai's Artifice

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems have 25% reduced Elemental Equilibrium effect
+(75-100)% to Fire Resistance when Socketed with a Red Gem
+(75-100)% to Cold Resistance when Socketed with a Green Gem
+(75-100)% to Lightning Resistance when Socketed with a Blue Gem

lines.flavourText: When the wind blows, |Know which way to bend|and watch the others break.

lines.name: Maligaro's Restraint

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (30-50) Lightning Damage to Attacks
Shocks you cause are reflected back to you

lines.flavourText: "Our genius will pave the way forward.|May all who are worthy be improved!"|- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: Mokou's Embrace
lines.flavourText: Fire makes the perfect blossom in the endless night.

lines.name: Perandus Blazon
lines.flavourText: A large enough debt turns even a friend|into an enemy, and the Perandus family|had more debtors than anyone.

lines.name: Prismweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (7-8) to (15-16) Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds (5-6) to (12-14) Cold Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to (30-34) Lightning Damage to Attacks
30% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills while using a Flask
10% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText: Nothing is as vivid as the rage of battle

lines.name: Rashkaldor's Patience

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Duration of Elemental Ailments on Enemies
Items and Gems have 10% reduced Attribute Requirements
5% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite

lines.flavourText: Fate's smile, man's ruin.

lines.name: Romira's Banquet

explicitModifiers.text: 0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Gain a Power Charge on non-Critical Strike
Lose all Power Charges on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText: The Empress gave Romira two sons|Born of his brother's seed|Romira threw her a banquet|A perfidious meal indeed.

lines.name: Shaper's Seed

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby Allies gain 2% of Life Regenerated per second
Nearby Allies gain 40% increased Mana Regeneration Rate

lines.flavourText: The first light to grow in the primordial darkness.

lines.name: Sibyl's Lament

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (8-15) to (20-28) Fire Damage to Attacks
Left ring slot: 40% reduced Reflected Elemental Damage taken
Right ring slot: 40% reduced Reflected Physical Damage taken
(20-30)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText: The portrait reflected his pain,|a pain that she could never see.

lines.name: Sidhebreath

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
(10-15)% reduced Mana Cost of Minion Skills

lines.flavourText: The breath of life is yours to give.

lines.name: Soulthirst

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Soul Eater while using a Flask
Lose Souls gained from Soul Eater on Flask Use

lines.flavourText: "They say a draught of fine spirits will ward off|the elements and promote a longer, merrier life.|I have found this to be true on all counts." |- Zerphi of the Vaal

lines.name: Sunblast

explicitModifiers.text: Traps Trigger at the end of their Duration

lines.flavourText: The sun's fury, trapped|in pillars of blazing light,|Explodes from its cage.

lines.name: Tear of Purity

explicitModifiers.text: Grants level 10 Purity of Elements Skill

lines.flavourText: A shimmering symbol of Purity, clear as water,|but I know better than most how quickly|Purity can succumb to Corruption.|How quickly water turns to blood.|- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: The Anvil

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 240 to 300 Physical Damage to Attackers on Block

lines.flavourText: Forge your Perseverance on the Anvil of Faith.

lines.name: The Aylardex

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Mana Regeneration Rate per Power Charge
1% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life per Power Charge
40% reduced Critical Strike Chance per Power Charge

lines.flavourText: Shackled fires dance about;|Might within from force without.

lines.name: The Ignomon

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 12 to 24 Fire Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText: The light that reveals is the glare that blinds.

lines.name: The Magnate

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-25)% to all Elemental Resistances with +200 or more Strength

lines.flavourText: Few men cast a longer shadow| than the Great Meginord of the North.

lines.name: Timeclasp

explicitModifiers.text: Temporal Chains has 50% reduced Effect on You

lines.flavourText: "To us mere mortals, time is slippery. |I'm just evening things out." |- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Ungil's Harmony
lines.flavourText: Gentle anger, raging calm.

lines.name: Valyrium

explicitModifiers.text: Stun Threshold is based on Energy Shield instead of Life

lines.flavourText: They will rise and fall in fire and blood.

lines.name: Warped Timepiece
lines.flavourText: As you have lived, so you shall die |forever trying to keep up with me. |Your blood on these hands of mine|forever makes me the public enemy.

lines.name: Wurm's Molt

explicitModifiers.text: 0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText: They say a lifetime of wisdom is carried|in every skin the great beasts shed.

lines.name: Soul Tether

explicitModifiers.text: Your Energy Shield starts at zero
You lose 5% of Energy Shield per second
Life Leech is applied to Energy Shield instead while on Full Life
Gain (4-6)% of Maximum Life as Extra Maximum Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: Vaal bloodpriests were among the earliest intellectuals on record. |It was they who found that a newly freed soul would |desperately cling to any other source of life.

lines.name: Maligaro's Cruelty

explicitModifiers.text: (25-30)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Killing an Enemy affected by 5 or more Poisons
(12-15)% chance to gain a Power Charge on Killing an Enemy affected by fewer than 5 Poisons
10% increased Damage with Poison per Frenzy Charge
3% increased Poison Duration per Power Charge

lines.flavourText: "He does not love. He does not feel regret or remorse.|He does not think about consequences, only possibilities.|If that does not describe a monster, tell me: what does?"|- Archbishop Geofri

lines.name: Heartbound Loop

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have 10% increased Area of Effect of Area Skills
350 Physical Damage taken on Minion Death

lines.flavourText: When the axe finally fell, Seryl shared his pain,|and the last thought that flickered through his|fading mind was her broken, shattered scream.

lines.name: Bloodboil

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-15) to (25-30) Fire Damage to Attacks
75% reduced Effect of Chill on You

lines.flavourText: Rage is a big part of courage.

lines.name: Extractor Mentis

explicitModifiers.text: 5% chance to gain Unholy Might for 3 seconds on Kill
5% chance to gain Onslaught for 3 seconds on Kill
5% chance to grant Onslaught to nearby Enemies on Kill
5% chance to grant Unholy Might to nearby Enemies on Kill
Recover 1% of Maximum Life on Kill

lines.flavourText: When slaughtered flesh falls silent,|the soul may yet scream on.
